mapper.insert: insert into employee_detail (userid, finalschool, email, phonenumber, address, marrystatus) values (#{userid},#{finalschool},#{email},#{phonenumber} ,#{address},#{marrystatus})
mapper.select: select userid, finalschool, email, phonenumber, address, marrystatus from employee_detail
select userid, finalschool, email, phonenumber, address, marrystatus from employee_detail where userid = #{userid}
